name: Kenati Technologies
overview:
As of October 16, 2007, Kenati Technologies, Inc. was acquired by 2Wire, Inc. Kenati Technologies, Inc. develops device software solutions for the home area networking market. The company offers software solutions for VoIP equipment, wireless equipment, residential gateways, security devices, broadband, VPN, IPTV, and video CPE devices. It also offers myHome portal, a Web-based software solution to share, manage, and update photos, music, and other data files with friends and family. The companyâ€™s products include components ranging from device drivers, to operating systems, to management interfaces. It has research and development facility in Pune, India.

Kenati Technologies, Inc. was founded in 1999 and is headquartered in Campbell, California.

acquisition.source_description: 2Wire buys Kenati, to extend broadband service platform
